document.title: Pellete de liens du 04-07-2005
document.author: NiKo
document.text:
MySQL Query Optimization Database management systems implement abstract concepts but do so on real hardware bound by real physical constraints. As a result, queries take timesometimes an annoyingly long time. Find out how to minimize your wait in this sample chapter. (Tags: mysql sql optimisation bdd )
Une bibliotheque pour nettoyer ses chaines - JDN Developpeurs ( via ) Un ensemble de fonctions Open Source en PHP permet de s'assurer que les donnees entrees par l'utilisateur sont traitables en toute securite. (Tags: php securite php.lib )
Ubuntu Forums - SCRIPT: Take back the Firefox Thunderbird logo I wrote this script because the Firefox icon is replaced with the horrible blue globe everytime Firefox is updated. (Tags: firefox ubuntu icones tip )
HB's Photo Stream Portfolio de photos sympathiques, tout en XHTML et CSS2. (Tags: webdesign photo portfolio galerie )
Comparatif des formats audio Match entre les formats FLAC - APE - MP3 - MP3PRO - MPC - OGG - WMA : Nette victoire de l'OGG. (Tags: mp3 son comparatif formats )
The Brick Testament La Bible en Lego. Nawak, mais drole quand meme. (Tags: fun religion haha bof )
Brilliant Button Maker by LucaZappa.com This is a web interface to create "80x15 brilliant buttons" (Tags: webdesign graphisme icones online.tools )
